{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Tenryou Commission Headquarters|It|The Tenryou Commission Headquarters}} is the headquarters of the [[Tenryou Commission]], the executive arm of the [[Shogunate]].</p>}}

The interior is an instance that can first be accessed during the {{Quest|Blind Loyalty, Reckless Courage}} as a [[Quest Domain]] with the [[Tenryou Commission Headquarters (Domain)|same name]].
